name: stable.exit()
description:
Simple shooter made for Ludum Dare 49, theme "Unstable". Take control of the Robohorse and escape across an endless western desert.

Controls:

  • Mouse in menus
  • WASD/Cursors to move
  • Space to shoot

Game implemented in Godot. Special thanks to Itch users:

  • anismuz
  • bakudas 
  • datagoblin
  • karnificial
  • penusbimc
  • samuellee
  • wenrexa
